value.title: DAX Fridays! #48: TIME (Calculate working hours)

We will also create an example with the TIME function where we will calculate the working hours in a calendar. value.title: Show rows with no data - Power BI Tips & Tricks #33

value.title: 3 ways Reporting Services and Power BI work together
